name: Hidden Object: Missing Violins! - Premium
summary: You have to help Giuseppe Stradivarius to find the stolen violins! The violins were made by the great master of stringed instruments. You also need to find the unique stand made from selected Tyrolean wood of long exposure. You have to solve a lot of intricate puzzles and overcome tricky obstacles before you find out who the thief is. During the investigation, look for hidden objects by lists, silhouettes and play mini - games.
